metadata.title: CVE-2022-1852 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s KVM module,which can lead to a denial of service in the x86_emulate_insn inarch/x86/kvm/emulate.c. This flaw occurs while executing an illegalinstruction in guest in the Intel CPU.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
